metadata.name: The Magic Mirror
metadata.description:
Art based on a Russian folk tale about a magical silver saucer and
apple. If you say cherished words, then the saucer shows what you want. These words only work when you have a good heart:
- Roll, roll, ripe apple, on a silver saucer, show me cities and fields, show me forests and seas, show me the heights of the mountains and the beauty of heaven, all dear Mother Russia.
